name: SudokuoftheDay
0:
”Alexa open sudoku of the day”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sudoku of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Puzzle Games.

Sudoku is a classic logic and numbers game.

The Rules: A 9×9 square must be filled in with numbers from 1-9 with no repeated numbers in each line, horizontally or vertically. To challenge you more, there are 3×3 squares marked out in the grid, and each of these squares can't have any repeat numbers either. There are 3 difficulties. Easy, medium and hard.

Complete the grid against the clock!

This skill is only supported on Echo Show and Fire TV devices.

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Puzzle Games.

Have Fun!
HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
